website_summaries.verdict: This cooler has multiple features, including a handy removable liner.
pros: Heat-welded seams plus the plastic liner prevent leaks
Multiple exterior pockets hold dry items, and lid bungees add extra storage space
2 front feet and 2 back wheels keep this cooler stable
cons: The telescoping handle doesn’t lock in the upright position

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed and very maneuverable!
customer_reviews.text: This item met all my expectations regarding performance, capacity & durability. I use it from Mondays thru Fridays to bring brakfast, lunch, snacks and beverages with me to work. Items remain very, very cold from 10 am to 7:30 pm. Of course, I use one or two ice packs, since I am constatly openning the cooler to reach for fruits, cheese and water and ice between meals. Recommend it wholeheartedly!
customer_reviews.author: Adela Dávila-Estelritz

customer_reviews.title: Well built, great value - perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler to make weekly trips to the Farmers Market easier - and this definitely fits the bill. The rollers are sturdy and the cooler is easy to pull without the wheels getting locked up or stuck like cheaper versions sometimes do. There's plenty of room in the cooler between the cooler part, the pockets and using the bungees on top for my weekly shopping trips. Definitely recommend if you're looking for something that would be good for taking to sporting events, the beach, camping or, like me, the Farmers Market.
customer_reviews.author: Misti C

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what i expected. Great quality for the price. If i should have any isdues after use, ill update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great!!! I bought two. I'm still breast feeding and currently separated from my son so I have to pump and freeze. I've traveled home several times with 70 bags of frozen breast milk on a plane (checked in baggage) and it's kept everything still froze after 6-8hr of traveling. Plus it has wheels which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: L. Roman

customer_reviews.title: Small wheels, wheel base and handle doesn't lock up
customer_reviews.text: The size is fine, the only 2 issues I have are 1 the handle doesn't lock in the upright position. The slightest push and it goes down. 2 the wheel base is so small that it seems to tip VERY easily. I guess there's actually 3 ... the wheels are so small.. I swear, this thing got yanked out if my hands numerous times in little sidewalk cracks or brick spaces. I'd like to return it but can't seem to find the damn "refund" or "return" button...
customer_reviews.author: DJ JDay

customer_reviews.title: Sigh another cooler that doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: this one had great reviews. we wanted something taller that held a good amount of items, with wheels, handle and not too heavy. this cooler meets all that and at first we thought it worked well. after a few uses, the ice melts too easily, the entire outside gets a little wet, and it just doesn't keep things cold for much longer than a few hours. My husband hates it. I should have sent it back but now it's probably too late. Just wouldn't recommend, especially if you live in the south where it gets really hot. we live in Ohio and have hot summers but not always.
customer_reviews.author: Jenae

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Will order another one for my husband's car :)
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, easy to clean and roomy. You can put so much in this cooler. I have it in my car all the time for when I go food shopping. Nice to have so when I have a lot to bring in, I put them all in this cooler and drag a lot more groceries per trip. When I went out to buy seafood and the plastic bags leaked, it did not leak through. All I had to do was take out the plastic bags, lifted the inside part and washed it out. It was dry the following day so the fishy smell was gone. A keeper for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Compact and keeps ice cold for a while
customer_reviews.text: We had a much larger, wheeled cooler that took up too much room in our trunk. We were trying to reduce the amount of stuff we were taking with us camping, as we have a smaller vehicle. We searched and found this cooler as a replacement. I wasn't sure the soft sides would hold up but we have now taken it with us on 3 camping trips and I am really impressed with the quality of the cooler. We had ice remaining after a couple days, with an average temperature of 70 degrees. I'd recommend this cooler if you want something that is a decent size and has good cold retention.
customer_reviews.author: Misty M

customer_reviews.title: Cheap handle, won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Purchased March 6th, and on April 13th the handle snapped off. Extremely pissed because I chose specifically because of the Coleman name over generics. Cut my finger and everything when the handle snapped off. Will not buy again and may not buy Coleman again, either.
customer_reviews.author: IndyMom

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cooler if it is possible to love a cooler. Fit on the front seat of my truck for a long trip, things stayed cold, easily wheeled it into my hotel room. It has just enough space to take drinks on a boat, short trips. Would fit four bags of ice if needed. Two through Three bags if you had it filled. Just the perfect size I was looking for with the ruggedness that Coleman is noted for. Super easy to clean, a must have !
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Southard Purdue

customer_reviews.title: Basic with plastic feel while rolling around
customer_reviews.text: Obviously it doesn't have four wheels so be careful not to keep allowing the thing to turn while pulling it. The handle could be sturdier but works if you are focused on it. My first use of it the plastic legs that were provide bent out of place. luckily the plastic underlay is Velcro so it doesn't come off. I had to bend the leg back into place. Not perfect but it works. Its easy to clean definitely.
customer_reviews.author: sinnerssin

customer_reviews.title: Actually leakproof. Aka.. perfect for life on the go!
customer_reviews.text: For starters, I've been through a lot of coolers in my day. Boating, beaching, and boozing generally does that to a girl. Nonetheless, this has been my favorite one to date. Not only does it roll along great, the size is perfect for my needs with plenty of pockets for storing my stuff. Plus, the removable plastic liner thing is A MUST. I wont buy a soft sided cooler without it. It means my cooler wont leak all over the floor, carpet, car, etc. And it makes it super easy to keep clean! Only con is that I wish it came in other colors, but that isn't even that major to me. 5 stars from me here. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyM

customer_reviews.title: Has some issues, but it's an ok cooler
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, the handle does not lock and will easily push down when trying to maneuver. Usually this isn't a problem, but still shows lack of design quality. Holds a decent amount of items. Zipper gets caught on inside lining and that will reduce the cooling effect in the future. Feet will probably need to be reinforced like my last cooler. Think my husband used jb weld or something like that after a leg had broken. This cooler hasn't broken a leg yet, but it won't hurt to take preventive action. Overall it is ok, but felt I overpaid a little based on the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, doesn't keep ice more that a couple of hours
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boat because it has wheels and is the right size for my needs but a full bag of ice will only last a few hours and the internal bucket is only full of water and warm drinks after no more than 4 hours. I even added frozen ice packs in the lid hoping that would help. I regret that I did not return this before my deadline ended. I will never buy another Coleman or any other soft cooler again. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Design!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this cooler umpteen times: beach, woods, family gatherings, camping. It has a unique design where the white heavy-duty plastic liner (almost like a basket) easily comes out to wash. That keeps the actual liner of this cooler clean. The front and side pockets are wonderful features. I wish the retractable handle would 'click' or latch into place when extended. But it still is very easy to tote around. This cooler is awesome. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MamaJo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to receiving this cooler but have been very disappointed when trying to use it. The handle does not lock in place when extended, making if difficult to handle. It tips over easily. It wobbles to the left and right as I try to walk with it. It is a very nice looking cooler, but function does not follow form, making it useless.
customer_reviews.author: clb562

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler but really uncomfortable to carry
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice cooler, it’s easy to clean and has lots of room. However, it has one major issue. There’s no way to comfortably carry it. It has wheels, yes, but sometimes you need to be able to carry it. The handles are on the sides so the cooler bumps into your legs. Otherwise a nice cooler.
customer_reviews.author: TAM

customer_reviews.title: Warm NOT cooler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking a nice way to keep drinks cold when by the pool and thought the liner was helpful NOT. Put 12 16oz bottles of juice inside (with liner in) and a 10# bag of ice after 3 hours ice was totally melted WHAT? So I removed the liner because I thought maybe it inhibited the cooling process and started all over again - same result. Forget this product
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Keith

customer_reviews.title: Not too big, not too small
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cooler for short trips. It keeps ice all day; however, most of it has melted over the course of the day. It doesn't keep ice like the hard plastic coolers; which I suppose is to be expected. It is lightweight and very easy to pull even loaded. My grandchildren could pull it.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Handle Retracts Too Easily
customer_reviews.text: Good cooler we bought as a replacement for an aging one of similar size that also had wheels and a handle. Main problem is that when the handle is fully retracted and you're pulling it along, if you stop suddenly or need to maneuver the cooler around and only slightly push down on the handle it starts to retract back into the body of the cooler. Our previous cooler had locking handles so if you wanted to retract it you had to push two small buttons on the cooler. A much better design in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and very portable.
customer_reviews.text: I like this cooler a lot, I have had it for over a year now and haven't had any problems with it, I walk only short distance with it, just a few blocks and don't carry very heave stuff, I think the heaviest is when I carry wines (8 bottles), I also avoid rough road surfaces with rocks or holes, I don't think that this is a heavy duty cooler,. It looks great, is very lightweight when empty, not problems with the wheels or the handle. I feel that I have got my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ceron

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and handy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this cooler for 4 or 5 years now and I highly recommend it. We’ve taken it to the pool and on very long trips. I needed something on wheels that was light weight and this fits my needs. It has been knocked around some but still looks new. The lift out liner is wonderful and easy to remove to empty and clean. If anything ever happens to it, I will get another.
customer_reviews.author: Mother

customer_reviews.title: Not what is made out to be
customer_reviews.text: A positive is that the plastic inner case comes out easily so cleaning is quick. Yes is on wheels and moves pretty easy. Other than that there wasn't much. Ice was all melted in about two hours, including the large solid blue ice. It just did not keep things cold as other small coolers I have had. It was advertised as being made in USA in the product description on amazon. However, when I took it out of the box, the tag on the cooler says, Made in China. I would not recommend this cooler, unless you will be using the contents in about two hours or so.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Extending handle does NOT Lock.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year for our yearly April Aruba vacation, and this is our second Coleman rolling cooler. This Cooler is sturdy and holds up well. Love the liner, keeps ice all day, even on the beach. I guess I would say a good cooler for the money, our only issue with this second one purchased is that the handle does NOT stay locked in place when extended. Which happened to be a problem when rolling it through the sand on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Well, I feel pretty stupid...should have read the reviews...
customer_reviews.text: One of the most important things to me is a locking handle, and it doesn't. Tons of other reviews mention this, and I missed it. You simply cannot push it, which is a huge flaw. Also, it is a little tipsy. My previous one was very stable. Otherwise it is very well built. I really like the look, and it holds a lot. I use it daily as a 'lunch box' and it does that part very well. Locking handle, Coleman are you listening?
customer_reviews.author: TimMac

customer_reviews.title: but is great for arount beach and hotel
customer_reviews.text: The cooler is ok and without the insert will meet airline carry on specs, which is why we use this type, It carrys laptop and such onto plane, but is great for arount beach and hotel. No it does not roll well on sand, as expected, but just hose it off at the shower so no sand is dragged to room. Only 3 stars because the cooler falls forward and leaks. Make sure you prop it up against something in car We are going to glue a small piece of wood with holes drilled in for the legs to the front. Hopefilly this will add stability without weight.
customer_reviews.author: QualityMindedCheapskate

customer_reviews.title: Great for a train trip
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have to buy train food all day and it made a nice leg rest. Seems pretty sturdy for the price and kept my food cold on a long day trip. Doesn’t leak as long as you keep it upright. Rolls easily on a smooth surface. A little awkward up and down stairs, but does have handles on the sides for picking it up. Rolling handle doesn’t lock in open position so better for pulling than pushing. All around very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: I use this for transport of a Bose S1 Pro.
customer_reviews.text: Wheels are memh. Handle collapses too easily. But, for the cost it works great for a Bose S1 Pro speaker. Remove the trashcan inner liner(lifts out) and your good to go. Padded, wheels, handle, etc. S1 Pro only weighs 15 pounds so under the limits of the cooler. I believe. As for a beer cooler, who knows, bottoms up !
customer_reviews.author: Yendor

customer_reviews.title: Not big and bulky , holds a lot and very mobile
customer_reviews.text: Brought to beach and have to say it’s amazing. Packed sandwiches for kids. Drinks for everyone and was able to fill with ice to keep cold. I’ve barely melted while we were at beach. Very mobile and not too big and bulky. Was able to store in back of SUV. A+++ exactly what we needed ! Thank you Coleman ! And great price to boot 😊
customer_reviews.author: E.C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and keeps things cold all day (and then some)
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect cooler for road trips. It holds a lot, tall bottles (think wine) fit easily. Things stay cold all day with one medium blue ice (or equivalent). It is relatively light (but for contents), and rolls easily. So, great for hauling things to picnics, in and out of lodgings, etc. Also handy for keeping drinks cold when your refrigerator is space-challenged for large parties or holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight cooler.
customer_reviews.text: We just came back from a 4-day trip and used this cooler. Wonderful experience. Even when it's full, it was easy to move around and to lift into the car. We packed three frozen water bottles in the bottom of the bucket insert and stacked our ziplock boxes on top. Everything stayed cool enough until we got to our hotel and could easily transfer everthing to the small refrig in our room. It would be great on a picnic, or to haul food to watch our grandchildren play soccer or softball. Great price, also. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: this is just ok. it does not wheel very well when you are rolling it full. the legs seem pretty flimsy, and I am guessing will not last long. the handle does not lock in place, so it is up or down but not locked at any time. the seams are a little off in stitching, and I fear that also will be an issue over time.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Mendes Brown

customer_reviews.title: well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Used 1st time yesterday. Very pleased. We load cooler and need to pull it down a long dock to our slip. Perfect. Love the removable insert. No more trying to rinse out the interlining of a cooler. Pull out the insert dump, rinse , replace. it's a quality Coleman product and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bob J.

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice bag, very well made
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice bag, very well made. I use these bags to keep my medical supplies as I am a traveling Physician. This was a replacement for the one I had as I accidentally ran over my bag while exiting the garage. It was not a Coleman but was well constructed and actually didn't do too badly but was sufficiently damaged thatit had to be replaced. I like this bag its only drawback is the forward pocket could have been built a little larger. Overall i am pleased with the bag. I took out the plastic liner and it gave me the necessary room I needed for my medical cases. iDO recommend this bag!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Metchnikov

customer_reviews.title: Good Design That Just Slightly Misses
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as we thought. We really like the hard plastic liner but were hoping for a separate storage area on the top like our last cooler. Even a tray that fits into the top of the hard liner would be nice. It gives you a place to put sandwiches and such while keeping the drinks in the wet cold below. Get's the job done for the times we need it at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Functionality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Love the outside pockets, the inside pockets, the removable inside container - much easier to keep clean, and the size is perfect to take for bringing healthy meals on the road, bringing cold soda and beer anywhere, and for refreshments when running, training for marathons. Great price too.This is what you expect from the Coleman brand, quality.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great for farmer’s market!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a hardcore cooler to keep things chilled for a weekend, but it is very versatile! We’ve taken it to the beach, to the farmer’s market and camping. Works like a charm! I like the removable inner plastic liner: It helps to keep the cooler clean. The elastic pouches on the sides work well for water bottles and little odds and ends. Very good product overall!
customer_reviews.author: D. V. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is a great size. It’s easy to roll and lift in and out of the car. It holds quite a bit. However, it does not keep things cold or hold ice longer than an hour or so. Not great for a long day at a sports field. I filled it at 630 with ice, rode 45 mins in the car and sat in the shade. By 830 it was completely water. Disappointed in that aspect. But I like the size and the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Field

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cooler
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is light, maneuverable and well constructed. My only quibble is it's on the tall side. We often use it in the back seat of the car and it can tip over on a turn if it's not weighed down or supported. It's not a biggy. While it's a soft sided cooler, it's got a rigid plastic liner that maintains the shape and is very easy to pull out and clean. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NY Giants Fan from MD

customer_reviews.title: Not insulated well
customer_reviews.text: If you really need to keep stuff cold this is not a cooler for you. It’s basically a plastic bowl inside a bag. Virtually no insulation. If you’re not going for R you’re just keeping drinks cold for a short period of time it would suffice. The size is good but it’s useless if it doesn’t keep my stuff cold for the purpose of traveling 14 to 16 hours in a car across country
customer_reviews.author: Tara W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Design!!
customer_reviews.text: The most brilliant part of my 10 day road trip!! I packed a collapsible bowl and microwaveable poached egg maker in the front zippered pouch, a food grater in one side pocket and camping utensils in the other pocket and stored all my receipts and laptop on the top bungee cords. I kept it on the seat beside me for easy access and secured it with the seat belt. I could easily clean the inside plastic liner and get more ice from the hotels where I stayed each day. It stored just enough food to prepare meals in the hotel microwaves for the entire trip! Only ate out a couple of times. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small cooler for the beach and this was perfect. It's not huge, but big enough to keep a few drinks, snacks, and sandwiches cold for a few people. Had it there for most of the day and everything stayed cold. The pockets, mesh holders on side, and bungee were great for storing sunscreen, napkins, etc. Also, the fact that you can just take the insert out and hose out when you get back is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Eimag

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep cold!
customer_reviews.text: Overall lightweight, nicely made....but useless since our ice melted within 2 hours!! I didn't really expect it to keep anything cold for really too long, but a few short hours?
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Long Haul
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 7 years ago. I still use it today. I've not only used it as a cooler but also as luggage. I still love this cooler and it still looks and works great. I'd give it 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: BobCz

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. The cooler arrived and the first thing I noticed was one of the bungy cords on the top was broken. My husband was able to make it work by tying a knot in it - but I should have sent it back. Then the worst part - the pull handle doesn't lock into place when extended. We had already tossed the box it came in so now we are stuck with it. Lesson learned. I thought purchasing the Coleman name would mean a great product - obviously not.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Keeps groceries cold!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler on wheels - especially for trips to the grocery store. It hold a lot and I can put away my frozen and refrigerated items first. I really like the plastic insert which makes it easy to clean. Also, the bungie cords on top make it easy to pack things on top.
customer_reviews.author: CBN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Cooler
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to go on our 40th wedding anniversary trip. It worked perfectly for us to take along food and drinks from home. It’s actually just like a piece of luggage on wheels. We’re both extremely pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't suggest.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't suggest this item. The first band on the top broke the minute I lifted it to place a small towel underneath and the second broke when I went to put the towel back. The handle doesn't stay locked in the up position. The zipper is difficult to zip and unzip. It keeps getting caught on the fabric. Disappointed. Unfortunately I didn't need to use right away, was saving for a soccer tournament and ended up missing the return date by two days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great portable cooler
customer_reviews.text: This cooler stays in my trunk for cold stuff from the store when not being used for anything else. The hard liner is great for transporting dripping meats and frozen items while only needing to rinse out afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. The shape, the size, except, when you are pulling it along, it gets wonky and wants to tip over. Also, the handle slides up with spacers that are supposed to catch so the handle is locked in place. This does not happen. The handle still slides up and down.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.Talley

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: love it.... it is the perfect size, and perfect for what I need it.... I volunteer at NASCAR and needed something to carry food and my other things necessary for my time there...and this is just perfect....so glad that I ordered it
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I need. I spend a lot of time at the beach and poolside. It keeps things cold in the Florida sun and is easy to wheel around. Lots of interior room. Pockets on the sides for lotions or paper plates. I use the top bungees for my beach towels. Roomy exterior zippered pocket for non-food items or things that don't need to be chilled.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect travel cooler! It's big enough to fit a lot of drinks, but small enough to fit behind the back seat of the car. Easy to navigate with the wheels, and I love the fact that you can pull out the plastic liner to empty the water when the ice melts.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.... OR TIME ORDERING
customer_reviews.text: I sent for this cooler... looked good. When it came, the handle does not lock in place. Sent for a replacement... same problem. Sent for the blue one (less expensive)... same problem.... sent all three back
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, holds all my beverages, snacks and then some. Wheels pretty good over sand and rocks. Great buy!!!!!!! Held 2 champagne bottles, 3 bottles of hint water, 1 liter bottle of regular water, a beer, a claw, 2 tubs of fruit, a bag of fruit, a sandwich, 2 fruit pouches and a half bag of ice with room to spare!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Prime-Azonian

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to the 'Coleman' name
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use traveling, but it 1) doesn't fold flat, and 2) the 2 wheels are small,and close together (8-1/2" center distance) and don't swivel, so it is difficult to pull without it getting caught on uneven sidewalks or changing directions. The cooler measures 10-1/2 deep x 12-1/2 wide and it would be better at about 9 deep x 14 wide with wheels further apart and swivel. It may be okay for very local moving around sodas, but it's a fairly inadequate roller board unit.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Meyer

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable, light
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable, light, has good capacity to carry food, fruit, ham, cheese and soft drinks. I'm not happy because the ice melted very quickly. It may work for a picnic day but not for a beach day or sunny day. I bought it thinking that it was a cooler. This is not really a cooler. I went with my family to the beach and I only keep the ice only for 6 hours!! and I kept it in the shade all the time. All was water inside... I think I could have bought another cooler that would keep the ice longer.
customer_reviews.author: Miriangela Orellana

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler so far. My previous cooler had a wider base and was shorter. Because this one has a smaller base, it takes up less room in a fully packed car. The lid has a bit of a dome shape that adds extra space. The front pocket expands a little thus, holds more. The lid of my previous cooler wouldn't stay open without holding it. This lid stays open (when handle is completely down) making it much more convenient when packing it. It holds A LOT!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect NASCAR cooler
customer_reviews.text: Used this for 6 NASCAR races this year. Works like a champ. I looked for some durable shoulder strap versions but, they all had faults. Pockets are a great advantage. Nice handle length for 6 foot tall man to pull. Rolled it through blacktop, concrete, grass, decking, and gravel. It never tries to roll over. I do carry it up stairs and bleachers to make it last longer. If destroyed, I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Red

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this primarily to use at an outdoor concert venue. Pros: Fits a lot in the main area and in all of the pockets Has hard plastic shell inside that is removable Wheels easy Cons: Leaks- Be careful not to tip over. Can be tricky to travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this unit about 3 1/2 years ago. We used constantly and is subject to lots of heavy uses. It seems to be a perfect size. Keeps items cold. It is the right size. The past week one of the legs broke off, probably from are hard usage. We are buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Its beach time!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler to drag my faves to the beach. Has lots of room and a plastic insert that is removable. Keeps things hot & cold.
customer_reviews.author: marian romain

customer_reviews.title: Too deep for me
customer_reviews.text: I wish, after using it, that it wasn’t as deep and tall as it is - I’d rather it be wider so that the food could go in and not have to pile up so that it smushes and you have to dig through it to find what you want. I wouldn’t buy it again - not because it’s bad, it’s just not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: lc's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Love the Coleman quality as always and love the size ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the Coleman quality as always and love the size of this cooler - it is going to be the perfect size for 2 people and the drinks that we want to bring to a camp out / party plus it will easily hold our blue tooth speaker / radio with the bungee on the top - the compartment in the front will easily hold our keys, phones, ciggs, portable battery pack with additional wires and snacks - also can fit a lot more things in the side mesh pockets -- Love that it is as easy as rolling a suitcase...
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. I like the size. I filled it w/drinks and food. It kept everything cool. I love that it has rollers. I'd buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: BevMcQ2

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: In terms of space and extra pockets for storage, it's fantastic. In terms of actually rolling it, it's dreadful. The telescoping handle to pull it doesn't lock, so it's terrible on hills, sand, and any uneven surface - be prepared to sprain your wrist, drag it on it's side ripping up the exterior nylon our watch it tumble away as it gets away from you. It's also very top heavy, which makes it prone to tipping over. If the telescopic handle locked I'd give it a higher score, but it's awful.
customer_reviews.author: Seeh2o

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cooler for our recent camping adventures. It's strictly used for canned drinks. Keeps the drinks cool, doesnt sweat on the outside of the fabric and the plastic liner on the inside is easily able to be removed if needed. Wipes out well. Wheels are sturdy and the handle easily pulls out and pushes back into place.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this, I should have bought the one I saw in Sam’s Club! It doesn’t have a way to drain out the water, you have to take the plastic trash can out from inside to dump the water, and it’s so unsteady - if you have any weight in it and you walk in anything but a straight line it topples over, it’s so annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ann C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Took to Aruba - packed it with frozen meats, all made it still frozen after 6 he trip - fits perfectly in the plane's overhead compartment. Then took it to the beach for 14 days full of ice, drinks and snacks rolling over bricks and sand ( well nothing with wheels rolls well in sand) so carried it - no problem. Only recommend improvement is:. Put button locks on the handle when full extend so it won't clasp when you go to pull it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cooler, I have had it 2 years now
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler, I have had it 2 years now. Works well in the car/hotel on trips as well as in the airport and checked. the biggest flaw is the front feet, one of them has broken off and now it will not stand up any longer. I've used it maybe 10 times at the very most. twice in the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler / Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This Coleman rolling cooler has a lot of bang for its buck. It is a great size and would be wonderful for tailgating and, or, picnicking. I, unfortunately, have to use it to transport medical supplies when I go on trips. It is a great value and everything is always kept very cool after I add my ice packs. The only complaint I have is with the handle. It sometimes is not very steady and won't stay up on its own well. If I had the option, I would give it 4 1/2 stars instead of just 4. Other the handle issues, I have no regrets about the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Why hurt your shoulder?!?
customer_reviews.text: Using this for my job as I work outside in very hot weather. The liner inside is great for ice and keeping my beverages cold. I have used other similar stroller types without liners and no matter what they may say —— they leak. This is working very well and the wheels are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: review

customer_reviews.title: it's tough
customer_reviews.text: I use this cooler for work,fishing,surf fishing and anything between. I can carry 2 one letter bottles 6 ice packs and still have room not including the out side pockets it's seen sand salt water and rock salt and still rolling a long the week point is the handle
customer_reviews.author: hookandrun

customer_reviews.title: Cooler than the other side of the pillow
customer_reviews.text: We love our new cooler! We have one before and the liner tore. I needed a new one for the softball beers. This one is great because the liner is a hard plastic inside another liner. And when we forget to take the beers out, it is still cold the next morning!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good Size.... Not too durable
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is a perfect size for putting your drinks in when you go to the park or to a barbecue. Very easy to roll and pretty sturdy. The three star is because the front legs that support the bag broke and the inside container also started to leak from the bottom. I love the size and I love the style.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect companion
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. I take it with me to the pool, kids games, beach, etc. It is so easy to take along! I like the side pockets for my phone, cookies, keys, etc. It holds plenty of cold drinks and snacks for my family which makes my life so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Bloopfish

customer_reviews.title: Great rolling cooler,  perfect when travelling.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present to son & daughter-in-law. Was filled with fresh frozen jumbo Gulf shrimp, king crab legs & scallops. Perfect for taking on 4hr flight home, no ice needed & fits perfectly in overhead bin.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great rolling cooler. The only thing that I am not happy about are the wheels. You have to be careful to not knock them around, or they will not hold up. Unfortunately, all the rolling coolers are like that. You can, however get replacement wheels.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep ice!!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this cooler has a removable liner and that it stands up on its own and that it has storage pockets. I don’t like that it doesn’t keep ice very long. We travel all over FL, AL and GA during summer playing baseball. In the heat of the day it doesn’t keep ice longer than one game and that is with the drinks being cold straight out of the fridge. Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: EricaK

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best!
customer_reviews.text: I use the cooler as a lunch box because I carry breakfast, lunch and dinner some day. It keep my food and water cool like a mini refrigerator. I have had several and this one is the best. This is my second one.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to travel
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple yetis but needed a cooler for weekend trips with wheels. This worked great and kept the drinks cold and kept ice better than I expected Easy to pull and pockets on the side for a glass or eyeglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kolde

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is perfect for my husbands work! He's a UPS driver and you know they need tons of water and food throughout the day. This cooler does the job and he doesn't even have to carry it. Win win
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: This chest is nice. The only thing I don't care for is the wheels are super small, so, it isn't good to roll on any surface except paved. I like the liner. The one I got this to replace had a handle on the lid so you could lift it with one hand. This one, you need 2 hands because the handles are on either side of the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Donna NaQuin

customer_reviews.title: Nice size portable cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great little cooler. Perfect size the boat or a trip to the ball park. Rolls nice. Handle is long enough. No problems keeping stuff cold. My fav part is the hard removable liner. When the ice melts, it keeps the water contained so the inside of the cooler doesn't get soaked and moldy. Just dump it out and ready for next time
customer_reviews.author: katy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were hoping for. We are a fast moving family of 5, plus a dog, so we are constantly on the go. This was a great way to keep things cold and on the go. The wheels, handles and straps were great too. Very pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Maine Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Best rolling cooler ever!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to my parents and our best friends. Well constructed, Love plastic basket liner to avoid leaking. Friends were able to load up goodies to take down to the neighbors house on New Year’s Eve.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Wheeled Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small cooler that when filled, would roll easily and store easily. Well, this Coleman 42-can soft cooler is exactly what I needed and more. The inside kept everything cold for almost 6 hours in direct sunlight (83 degrees). I didn't use ice, I used those plastic "ice" packets and they were still cold by the time I got home. The wheels were great rolling over a short dirt road and grass. Easy breezy cooler and I am very glad I bought it. I will be using this a lot! Another plus is if I did use ice, the inside comes out for easy cleaning and dumping. Great feature.
customer_reviews.author: K. Boyd-McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I send this to my daughter as a gift and surprise. She loves it and uses it to carry things on her daily walks. She is disabled and has no transportation and so when she goes food shopping this works very well for her. She likes to feel independent and so now with this cooler she can do her own shopping.
customer_reviews.author: LindaMD

customer_reviews.title: Wheels too small- causes the cooler to twist when pulled over a curb or uneven surface
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are much too small. When pulling it over curbs or uneven surfaces it twists and hurts your wrist. Had I thought about that feature before I placed the order I would not have bought the item. This design defect should have been obvious to the manufacturer and I'm surprised they sold a product that doesn't function well except on smooth, even surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schaller

customer_reviews.title: Help!
customer_reviews.text: HELP! I need a replacement part for the top of the handle! Somebody contact me back and tell me how to get one. Coleman has not answered. I like this cooler very much, and this would be a simple repair. But it’s useless to me the way it is now.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E.

customer_reviews.title: Quality cooler.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cooler. The best part about this cooler is that the inside contains a hard plastic bin that keeps everything cold and is easy to clean if it something leaks. The pockets on the outside are useful. The only thing that should be fixed is that the retractable handle does not lock to stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good!
customer_reviews.text: Here's what I like: Hard sided removable interior therefore easy to clean, rolls easily, very stable, roomy. Here's what I wish I could change: it's taller than I expected, so I can't put it on my counter and fill it and I'm 5'6". I have to put it on a chair. We use this every weekend to go to our country home, so it gets lots of use. My husband also said that if we fill it to the max, it's a problem closing the trunk of our sedan without squooshing it. All said, I like it much better than our last cooler and it's much easier clean up spills.
customer_reviews.author: V. Kaufmann

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool.
customer_reviews.text: I like this cooler. I use it along with the Shock freezer bags I bought. I pack some cold drinks and three bottles of frozen water. I wanted to see if the water would stay frozen as I want to try ice cream in cooler. The water stayed frozen for seven hours (that is how long my trip was). I am gong to try ice cream next. :)
customer_reviews.author: Chequita

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: Use on my fishing trips, plenty of ice left in The cooler after a 6 hour fishing trip, handle is sturdy, and zipper top is great for not flying up when moving on the boat. I give it an A+ as compared to similar coolers that I have used and replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Larry C Norton

customer_reviews.title: cool cooler
customer_reviews.text: Use it all over the world to take on long trips with me. I keep food in it and just have to take out the bucket and stick in in the refrigerator... Even good to go grocery shopping with. I never have to carry a bag! Just wheel it around. Its not as sturdy as a well made roller bag, and sometimes rides on two or three wheels.... but its still a good bag that has many functions.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: love my new rolling cooler
customer_reviews.text: love my new rolling cooler. the carry ones are getting just too hard for me to handle so this rolling one fits the bill. It holds a lot, and I love the shape... takes up height not width. it fits easily in my front seat or trunk area. I make my own blocks of ice by filling a gallon ziplock 1/4 with water, doubling the bag with anther ziplock, then freezing. The block stayed frozen from an overnight trip..in the car on a hot summer day and all night in a hotel room. It was still a small block when i arrived home.
customer_reviews.author: Klein

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: We used this cooler for our soccer tournaments and travel for a 6 hour car ride. This works great! Love that it comes with a plastic bin that is removable for cleaning, the handle height is great and it is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chenelle86

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and appearance!
customer_reviews.text: Super useful! Not bulky and very decent appearance! It keeps beverages cold for almost the whole day! So worth to have it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia De La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and practical gift for (almost) anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift for 2 different occasions. The best part is that it has an internal hard sided liner that lifts out for easy emptying and cleaning. I’ve owned 2 rolling coolers and they are great, but they are hard to dump out, drain, and clean. I wish I had bought a third one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small trips. Comfortable to pull and fits alot. Took this to Knotts Berry Farm hotel and was so easy to use. It fit a full big bag of ice from target 15 small water bottles 18 small bottles of soda. Could of fit a little more but didn't want to pack too much. Loved this chest can't wait to take fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Banuelos

product_meta.title: Coleman 42-Can Soft Cooler with Removable Liner & Wheels
product_meta.description: The Coleman 42-Can Wheeled Soft Cooler goes with you to the campsite, the BBQ, sporting events, tailgates and beyond. It features durable wheels and a retractable handle, so it's easy and comfortable to transport to wherever the party is. The cooler is big enough to hold 42 cans, and features plenty of extra storage space in its front zippered pocket, side mesh pockets, and mesh pocket in the lid. There are even bungees on the lid for stowing more extras! The cooler is soft on the outside and has a hard plastic liner inside to protect the contents from being crushed. The liner material is FDA approved for food contact, and is removable for easy cleaning. The Soft Cooler provides to resist odors, mold, and mildew.
feature_bullets: Treated with antimicrobials to resist odor, mold, mildew, and fungus from forming on removable liner that offers packing flexibility and easy cleaning
Zippered main compartment keeps contents cold; use hard plastic liner if packing with ice, no need for liner with ice substitutes
Telescoping handle and durable wheels for easy transport; side handles for more carrying control
Front zippered pocket, 2 side mesh pockets, dry storage pouch, and lid bungees offer added storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
